about_the_game:
It’s a holiday and Carnaval time! Everyone is celebrating—except for some pesky little aliens who’ve decided to invade Earth today!

  • Immerse yourself in a bespoke soundtrack, exclusively composed for the game, that harmonizes with every beat of the action.
  • Enjoy a visually stunning experience with all cartoon art meticulously hand-drawn by real human illustrators!
  • Collect various random power-ups and recruit new musicians for your truck.
  • ]Expand your band with diverse members such as a guitarist, drummers, and keyboard player!

How many waves of enemies will you be able to survive?
detailed_description:
It’s a holiday and Carnaval time! Everyone is celebrating—except for some pesky little aliens who’ve decided to invade Earth today!

  • Immerse yourself in a bespoke soundtrack, exclusively composed for the game, that harmonizes with every beat of the action.
  • Enjoy a visually stunning experience with all cartoon art meticulously hand-drawn by real human illustrators!
  • Collect various random power-ups and recruit new musicians for your truck.
  • ]Expand your band with diverse members such as a guitarist, drummers, and keyboard player!

How many waves of enemies will you be able to survive?
legal_notice: All rights reserved to Enchant Games
name: Carnival Survivors The Parade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c

short_description: Lead a Carnaval parade truck and defeat hordes of aliens with the power of music! Blending roguelike elements with cute 2D characters, your choices shape your progress as you recruit new musicians, each one boosting your trio’s strength with their unique musical abilities! Survivors meets Carnival!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
